question: What is the generic name of the Xofluza?
ideal_answer: Baloxavir marboxi is the generic name of Xofluza. It is approved for influenza.

snippets.text: Baloxavir marboxil (Xofluza®; hereafter referred to as baloxavir), the prodrug of baloxavir acid, is a first-in-class, small molecule inhibitor of the polymerase acidic (PA) protein subunit of the influenza virus polymerase complex.
Xofluza (baloxavir marboxil) for influenza approved in Japan under the SAKIGAKE Designation System is a good example of clinical trials including Japan.

Arikayce (amikacin liposome inhalation suspension) for Mycobacterium avium complex lung disease; Xofluza (baloxavir marboxil) for acute uncomplicated influenza; and Nuzyra (omadacycline) for community-acquired bacterial pneumonia and/or acute bacterial skin and skin structure infections.
The latest approved antiviral is baloxavir marboxil (trade name, Xofluza) which targets the endonuclease function of the viral PA polymerase subunit and prevents the transcription of viral mRNA.
Baloxavir marboxil (Xofluza®), recently approved for clinical use, inhibits cap-snatching endonuclease.

Baloxavir marboxil (Xofluza), an antiviral flu treatment, has now been approved to prevent influenza.Pa

Baloxavir marboxil (Xofluza), an antiviral flu treatment, has now been approved to prevent influenza.Patients should avoid taking calcium, aluminum, or magnesium products while receiving baloxavir as this will lead to a loss of antiviral efficacy.

In any case, from the innovation of to begin with antiviral medicate Idoxuridine in 1962 to the revelation of Baloxavir marboxil (Xofluza) that was FDA-approved in 2018, the hone of creating antivirals has changed significantly.
